summary: This is a simple mod that allows you to change the way Sofia looks. Just download the version you want and follow an easy installer.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img921/3472/xrSw48.png[/img]

[url=https://www.facebook.com/ClearanceClarenceMods][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/640x480q90/924/cG7PGI.png[/img][/url]

[size=3][color=#e69138][b][i]Screenshots are Wanted! If some of you could upload some screenshots it would be much appreciated![/i][/b][/color][/size]

[size=3]This mod allows you to change the way Sofia looks. You can change the body textures, teeth, face, hair, freckles, eyebrows and eyes. Just download with NMM and use the installer packaged in the archive.[/size]

[img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/320x240q90/922/tUyKv0.png[/img]

[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54527/?]Sofia - The Funny Fully Voiced Follower[/url][/size]

[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img924/2578/9D7W5O.png[/img]

[color=#0b8db3][size=6]Manual Installation[/size][/color]
[size=3]Download the package you want and extract it using WinRar. Now you have 3 folders. Base, FOMod and Options. Delete the FOMod folder since you won't need it. Now go to the base folder and select the bodytype you want and open that folder and copy the .nif files to [i][color=#6aa84f]data\meshes\actor\character\sofia[/color][/i] and overwrite the .nif files. Now the body is installed. Now go into the options folder and chose what kind of texture you want. Once you find it open it and copy all the files to [i][color=#6aa84f]data\textures\actor\character\sofia[/color][/i]. The eyes goes into the [i][color=#6aa84f]sofia\eyes[/color][/i] folder. Hair meshes goes to [i][color=#6aa84f]data\meshes\actor\character\sofia\hair[/color] [/i]and hair textures goes to[i] [/i][i][color=#6aa84f]data\textures\actor\character\sofia\hair[/color][/i]. The [color=#6aa84f][i]000012C4.NIF[/i][/color] file goes to [color=#6aa84f]data\meshes\actors\character\FaceGenData\FaceGeom\SofiaFollower.esp. [/color]The Brows goes to [i][color=#6aa84f]textures\actor\character\sofia\femalebrows[/color][/i]. The freckles goes into [color=#6aa84f][i]textures\actor\character\sofia[/i][/color][i].[/i][/size]

[size=6][color=#0b8db3]Hair[/color][/size]
[size=3]Is there any special hairstyle from Apachii you want to see Sofia have in future releases? Give me the name of the hairstyle e.g.[i] Hair23 [/i]and I will add it in the future releases of this customizer. Come with your wishes in the Forum tab dedicated to hairstyles.[/size]

[size=3]Want to make your own hairstyles? Download the tutorial![/size]

[color=#0B8DB3][size=6]Credits[/size][/color]
[size=5][color=#0B8DB3]Body Meshes[/color][/size]

files.name: Sofia Customizer Redux - CBBE - 6.2
files.changelogHtml: Uodated the meshes and removed the TBBP version since they didnt work. You can easily generate your own meshes to include TBBP

files.name: Sofia Customizer Redux - UNP - 6.2
files.changelogHtml: Uodated the meshes and removed the TBBP version since they didnt work. You can easily generate your own meshes to include TBBP

files.name: Sofia Customizer Redux - CBBE - 6.3F
files.changelogHtml:
Updated all textures to the latest version
Fixed several issues with the FOMod installer
Fixed an issue with the Mature set where the specular maps for the UNP were corrupt.
NOTE: This is the final update for this Customizer
